name: Vista Outdoor Inc.
description: Vista Outdoor Inc. is a leading global designer, manufacturer, and marketer of consumer products in the outdoor sports and recreation markets. Founded in 2015, the company was created through the merger of several established brands and has since focused on providing a diverse range of products for outdoor enthusiasts. Vista Outdoor operates through two primary segments: Shooting Sports and Outdoor Products. The Shooting Sports segment includes well-known brands such as Federal Ammunition, CCI, and Speer, offering ammunition and related products for hunting, sport shooting, and law enforcement. The Outdoor Products segment encompasses a variety of outdoor lifestyle brands, including CamelBak, Camp Chef, and Bell, which provide innovative gear and equipment for camping, hydration, and cycling. With a commitment to sustainability, Vista Outdoor emphasizes responsible sourcing, environmental stewardship, and community engagement. The company actively supports outdoor conservation efforts and promotes safe and responsible outdoor activities. Vista Outdoor aims to inspire and equip individuals to enjoy outdoor adventures while fostering a deep appreciation for the natural world. Through continuous innovation and a focus on quality, Vista Outdoor has established itself as a trusted name in the outdoor recreation industry.
